      • getCurrentVersion

        public abstract int getCurrentVersion()
        Return current factory version.

      • initialize

        public abstract LedgerManagerFactory initialize(AbstractConfiguration conf,
                                                org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper zk,
                                                int factoryVersion)
                                         throws IOException
        Initialize a factory.
        Parameters:
        conf - Configuration object used to initialize factory
        zk - Available zookeeper handle for ledger manager to use.
        factoryVersion - What version used to initialize factory.
        Returns:
        ledger manager factory instance
        Throws:
        IOException - when fail to initialize the factory.

                           throws IOException
        Uninitialize the factory.
        Throws:
        IOException - when fail to uninitialize the factory.

                                                                        throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                                                                               InterruptedException,
                                                                               org.apache.bookkeeper.replication.ReplicationException.CompatibilityException
        Return a ledger underreplication manager, which is used to mark ledgers as unreplicated, and to retrieve a ledger which is underreplicated so that it can be rereplicated.
        Returns:
        ledger underreplication manager

        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException

                                                           org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper zk)
                                                    throws IOException,
                                                           org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                                                           InterruptedException
        Create new Ledger Manager Factory.
        Parameters:
        conf - Configuration Object.
        zk - ZooKeeper Client Handle, talk to zk to know which ledger manager is used.
        Returns:
        new ledger manager factory
        Throws:
        IOException
